text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchtruckerey zu Bern und folgende Bücher in gar geringem Preiß zu haben, als: 1. <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. H Ringieri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>CX. Conciones de Ccena Dominic.</TITLE> <VOLUME>3. Vol.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1680</YEAR>. das Eremplar in albo achthalben <PRIZE>bz.</PRIZE></BIBL> 2. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rissenii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Summa Theolog.</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1703</YEAR>. † <PRIZE>10. Batzen,</PRIZE> und auff Schreib-papier <PRIZE>14. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 3. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rodolphi</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Compend. Theol. Christ</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern</PLACE><YEAR>1713</YEAR>. † <PRIZE>8 Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 4. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Carechetischer Leuchter und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erklärung und Gebatt über den Heydelbergischen Catechismum,</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE> <YEAR>1711</YEAR>. mit dem Kupffer-Btatt haltet <PRIZE>15. und ein halben Bogen,</PRIZE> † <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 5. <BIBL><TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Rein,</PLACE> † <PRIZE>15. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 6. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Ewig- vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegrundete unüberwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinderen GOttes,</TITLE> gründlich vorgestellt über die Worte des 125. Pfalms 9. 1. <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1704</YEAR>. † <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":15,"explanation":"The primary corrections involved resolving corrupted character encoding sequences (e.g., `\\u221a\\u00bc` to `ü`, `\\u221a\\u2020` to `†`) which obscured German umlauts and a price marker. This accounted for 13 character fixes across the text. Additionally, two structural errors were fixed in entry 6: correcting the mismatched closing tag `</PRICE>` to `</PRIZE>`, and moving the reference '9. 1.' out of the `<FORMAT>` tag, as it describes content (Psalm reference) rather than physical book format."}

parsed.explanation: The primary corrections involved resolving corrupted character encoding sequences (e.g., `\u221a\u00bc` to `ü`, `\u221a\u2020` to `†`) which obscured German umlauts and a price marker. This accounted for 13 character fixes across the text. Additionally, two structural errors were fixed in entry 6: correcting the mismatched closing tag `</PRICE>` to `</PRIZE>`, and moving the reference '9. 1.' out of the `<FORMAT>` tag, as it describes content (Psalm reference) rather than physical book format.
